channel.title: How i put npc
channel.description:
How do i put npc a place i want.
For example:
I want an Dark Beast to start place.
I am using sokolscape as source..

item.title: How i put npc
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

Yeah, you need to add it in autospawn.cfg, in the “tutorial” section are good guides

Read full topic

item.title: How i put npc
item.dc:creator: @sokolscape sokolscape
item.description:
@sokolscape wrote:

go into autospawn.cfg

copy one whole line and hit enter at the end of the line or document

paste it and just edit the npc ID and the X and Y coords of the npc

Read full topic

item.title: How i put npc
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

ok first you’ll need to know dark beast id lets say its 0001 (its not but who cares)
then find the cordinate you want to put it
open up autospawn.cfg (pile of books)
copy one of the monsters press enter then press paste
so you should have a duplicated line… 2 lines that look the same
then change the first number to 0001 or the dark beast id
then change the next to the x and y cordinates
then make sure the next 2 are 0s
save then compile

Read full topic
